attributes.action: Open barbers and hairdressers before 4th july
attributes.additional_details: Because your opening up non essential shops but not barbers and hairdressers which should be opened aswell as people still need to work to support there families
attributes.background: I would like them to open up barbers and hairdressers before the 4th july as long as they are following safety rules

rejection.details:

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:
